person.persName: Thomas S. Bryan (Louisville, Kentucky, banker and Prov govt secy)

body.p:
Louisville, Kentucky, sherrif, banker, and provisional government convention member
and assistant secretary. Kentucky native. Married to Lucy Jane Venable Bryan in Christian County, Kentucky, on October 17, 1844. Father of George V. Bryan, John Bryan, Lucy Bryan, and Thomas Bryan. Sheriff in Christian County in 1850. Banker in Christian County in 1860. Assistant secretary for the convention of the provisional government of Kentucky held at Russelville in November 1861.
